name: Triumph - LOJam 2019
description:
Gamepad Recommended!

LOJam 2019 game created in 48 hours. This game is meant to promote positive mental health by presenting the player with a seemingly overwhelming challenge, but through persistence they will improve and overcome the challenge which will hopefully instill confidence in themselves. To fit the LOJam theme 'Healing is not linear', the player is healed for exponentially less every time they use their healing potion. Special thanks to Daniel Sottile for the music!

=== Gamepad Controls ===

[X] - Light Attack

[Y] - Heavy Attack

[LB] - Block

[A] - Heal

[Joystick Left/Right] - Dodge

=== Keyboard Controls ===

[F] - Light Attack

[G] - Heavy Attack

[S] - Block

[H] - Heal

[A/D] - Dodge
